site.description: Jadex tools to create Jadex BPMN and GPMN models

category-def.name: jadex.editor.xpmn
category-def.label: Jadex Eclipse Model Tools
category-def.description: Eclipse plugins that support developing Jadex applications based on BPMN and GPMN.

category-def.name: jadex.editor.plugins
category-def.label: Jadex Eclipse Plugins
category-def.description: Eclipse plugins that aid in developing Jadex applications.

category-def.name: jadex.editor.outdated
category-def.label: DO NOT INSTALL
category-def.description:
These plugins are only updates to outdated versions of the Jadex BPMN Editor.
-- !DO NOT INSTALL THEM AS NEW FEATURES! --
Due to version and plugin-id changes these plugins will prompt you to uninstall the current installed version and install the new one from the update site.
